articles.title: What’s new in July for PlayStation Plus members? - Culturess
articles.description: July brings about the 10th anniversary of PlayStation Plus! Members can expect this month's offerings to be top of the line. Let's check it out. Rejoice, P...
articles.content:
Rejoice, PlayStation Plus members! You’ve had 10 years of Sony’s free games program! That seems incredible and amazing and a good cause for celebration.
